name: Mantra Sierra Grand

reviews.text: My extended family (8 of us) stayed for 10 nights in the penthouse and booked through Gold Coast Rentals. (www.realholidays.com.au). It was so windy we couldn't swim or go up on the rooftop in the spa. The pool area is very ordinary (a concrete jungle) and the traffic noise is really bad. It's in a good location, within walking distance to Pacific Fair, other shopping, restaurants and the beach but it was not what we were looking for, particularly for the amount we spent (over $3,500.00). This was a "once in a lifetime" holiday for a couple of us and we wished we had stayed somewhere with a more inviting pool area which was shielded from the wind.
reviews.title: Unsure???
Great hotel, Excellent service- concider it!
reviews.text: We were on the 23rd floor and overlooked the highway and pacific fair. We could hear the traffic but it did not bother us more of a hum if that makes sence. We stayed in the one bedroom unit room, so I can not comment for families. The facilities were overall excellent. The service was great. We needed beach towels and hired some for $5ea which we received deposit back upon returning them. We stayed for 8 nights. Upon arival we received choc and a bottle of red. The hotel is close to a major shopping centre and facitities. We thought to describe the location it would be surface paradise within a long walk or short drive.

reviews.title: Sierra Grand - A Modern & Cosy Apartment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We took advantage of Mantra's last minute deals and booked a 1 bedroom apartment for our 3 day stay and we were very happy with what we got.
reviews.title: Nicest Mantra in Broadbeach

likes.disliked: — The shower was not the best

reviews.text: Our 1 bedroom apartment was situated on the 24th floor (Sierra Grand is a 30 level building). - Very surprised to get a room on such a high level, and although we were hoping for an ocean view, we had excellent high views of the Hinterland, directly infront of Pacific Fair & Draculas. The view was most outstanding during sunset, as our view was facing west, it overlooked the golden/orange sky falling into the mountain horizon. - very beautiful & romantic!
reviews.title: Excellent apartment

likes.disliked: — Quite busy even outside school holidays

reviews.text: We booked the 2-bedroom apartment at the Mantra Sierra Grand based on the positive reviews here from previous occupants. And I am glad to say it was a fabulous choice.
reviews.title: Loved the Mantra Sierra Grand

reviews.text: Our family of 5 have been to the Gold Coast before but have always stayed at Surfers Paradise. We thought we should try Broadbeach this time as Surfers Paradise, in our view, was getting more congested.
reviews.title: Modern apartments with great views
Sierra Grand Nice
reviews.text: We asked for an apartment above the 12th floor with ocean view and got a 20th floor apartment with partial ocean view. We were delighted. The apartment was clean with modern furnishing and a fully-equipped kitchen (2-door refreigerator/ microwave oven/ convection oven/ electric kettle) and laundry room (front loader washer plus dryer). All the electrical appliances look spanking new.

Teabags and coffee sachets were given. Complimentary small bottles of shampoo, conditioner and body lotion as well as shower caps/toilet rolls/tissue boxes were provided for both the bathrooms. For the kitchen and laundry room, two sachets each of dishwashing liquid, dishwasher detergent and washing powder were given the first time round, Additional supplies would need to be purchased for a small fee. Towels and bedlinen were well-laundered and of 5-star grade. You might have guessed that I am the lady of the house and all these details matter to me!
reviews.title: Wonderful experience

likes.liked: — Facilities and closeness to shops, beach and restaurants

reviews.text: The hubby and the 3 boys were thrilled with the 40" plasma TV and the DVD player. There was broadband internet access from the apartment (a great relief to us) but this need to be purchased from relevant service providers - which is OK - so long as we could have access to the internet when we needed it..
reviews.title: Loved the Sierra Grand

likes.disliked: — Sharp edges on the glass topped coffee table

reviews.text: We have just returned from 7 nights at the Sierra Grand. We were on the 19th Floor on the right hand side of the building as you look out to the ocean. We had a lovely view but may have not been the same from the back of the hotel or on the left hand side. I did request an ocean view on high floor upon booking.
reviews.title: Sierra Grand Broadbeach Fun For Families

likes.liked: — Ocean view and clean, new apartment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a 3 bed apartment for a girls weekend. Our room was on the 3rd floor (the reception is on the 2nd floor) the room was adjacent to the road and VERY noisy with traffic from the gold coast highway. The room was beautiful, very modern, well decorated,and very clean. The other draw back was that the curtains/blinds are very thin and the light comes in the room day and night. I would stay at this hotel again but NOT in that room, I couldnt sleep at all despite a compfy bed. When booking be sure to get a room on a high level away from the highway. We only stayed overnight but if we were staying any longer I would have asked to move rooms.
reviews.title: Great hotel but dont stay on a lower level

reviews.text: The girls at reception were lovely, we arrived early and left our bags there while we walked across the road to the shopping centre, the hotel called us at 12pm to advise our room was ready (we weren't due to check in until 2pm) so that was nice :)
reviews.title: Amazing Views

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just come back from staying 10 nights at the Sierra Grand in a Sub-penthouse apartment on the 29th floor (apartment 2904) we were one floor off the top floor. We booked through the internet with Gold Coast Holiday Stays and got a good rate.
reviews.title: absolutely fabulas

reviews.text: Our apartment had three bedrooms plus a media room that could be turned into another bedroom and had a sofa that folded out into a spare bed. The main room had a view out to the ocean and we left the blinds up so in the morning could roll over and look at the view and bathe in the sunshine. The main ensuite had two hand basins, toilet, shower plus a spa bath which we all enjoyed. The second bathroom had toilet, bath, vanity and shower. There was also a third toilet by itself. We had three TVs and a DVD player, plus small sound system. Kitchen was well equipped and there were supplies of soap powders, etc enough for a couple of days.
reviews.title: Value for money, great amenities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The apartment was right opposite Pacific Fair Mall and I was a bit worried about the noise factor however on the 29th floor didn't find that an issue.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel, great customer service

description: Mantra Sierra Grand is located in Broadbeach - the Gold Coast's fastest growing destination for holiday makers. Within walking distance of award winning restaurants, cafes, Boutiques shopping and the Gold Coast largest shopping centre, Pacific Fair. As well as Conrad Jupiters Casino and the Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre.
